extendedInfo.description: CPA Exam Questions with Rationales AND Flash Cards in a single mobile app + Free content updates! * This is a Companion App to the Computer-Based CPAexcel CPA Review Course. This App allows CPAexcel Students to access their exam prep content on-the-go. ** If you are not a registered CPAexcel student, you will have access to a very limited amount of content within this app. *** To become a registered CPAexcel student, visit www.cpaexcel.com This application, built exclusively for CPAexcel students, enables you to drill and master CPA Exam material anywhere, anytime! Turn your down time into productive time with this powerful CPA Exam Prep Mobile App. Use your phone to master more study content. Drill with more than 4,600 multiple choice questions complete with answers and rationales! Reinforce your factual knowledge using 4,000+ easy-to-read digital flash cards! Study on this mobile app, on your iPad, and/or on your computer. Your lesson progress is automatically updated and synchronized. Your scores are always current. You can pick up right where you left off! Registered CPAexcel Students Can Access: - AICPA Released CPA Exam Questions with Answers and Rationales - 4,600 Exam Questions with Complete Explanations - 4,000+ Digital Flash Cards - Advanced Metrics: Automatically synchronized! - Search or Browse by Lesson or Topic - Tag Questions and Flash Cards for Later Use CONTENT AUTHORS: Professor Donald E. Tidrick â Ph.D., CPA, CMA, CIA Professor Dan Stone â Ph.D., CPA, MPA Professor Pam Smith â Ph.D., CPA, MBA Professor Robert A. Prentice â J.D. Professor Marianne M. Jennings â J.D. Professor Janet D. Gillespie â Ph.D. Professor Donald R. Deis Jr. â Ph.D., CPA, CFE Professor Charles J. Davis â Ph.D., CPA Professor B. Douglas Clinton â Ph.D., CPA, CMA Professor Greg Carnes â Ph.D., CPA Professor Allen H. Bizzell â Ph.D., CPA

reviews.title: Questons and answers
reviews.comment: I love this app, but if you could allow the capability to switch between question and answer multiple times.  It only allows to see the answer once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for moving around
reviews.comment: Love it.  I take public transportation and walk a lot daily. With this app in my phone, I can take the quiz anywhere.  It will be better if the app has all PQ too. The app only has EQ & FC so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great, doesn\'t sync with software
reviews.comment: I like to be able to quiz myself without being tied to a computer, but I would really like it if the questions I \"tag\" would be tagged in the software after I update the metrics. Seem like this is the purpose, but doesn\'t work. I\'m not sure if the questions answered transfer correctly as I haven\'t really paid much attention, but I need to be able to go back to tagged questions in the software.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Android 4.1
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t work on Android version 4.1  I have experienced the app freezing up and crashing on both my Samsung Galaxy Nexus and Nexus 7 tablet device running version 4.1.1.  When doing the questions provided on the app, the app becomes unresponsive when selecting the answers to the question it asks and this also happens when looking through the flash cards too.  Please update the app to resolve the compatibility issue on current devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Answer cannot be selected
reviews.comment: It\'s frustrating that in many cases you cannot select the answer by pressing a dot against the answer, especially if an answer is one-line sentence. Must be some finger pressure sencetivity issue within the app. Plese fix it. Other than that works good.
reviews.author: Oleg Scherbina

reviews.title: Need the audit part to be updated
reviews.comment: Good app overall but I have two issues with it: 1. My progress does not update at all so I can\'t tell which questions I already did and which I haven\'t 2. The most pressing issue is that the Audit section is not updated for the latest changes. I avtually downloaded the app 5 months ago and I have neber had an update. ... I think that should be addressed
reviews.author: Carmen Oana Ion

reviews.title: Timed quiz takes many attempts to register my selection
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure if this is is issue only with Samsung phones, but I know I\'m not alone. Quite annoying.
reviews.author: Delia Dubois

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: While I love having this kind of access, I can\'t find away to sort the topics in the same order as presented in my online material. That would be very helpful
reviews.author: Tabetha Berge

reviews.title: Doesn\'t sync or show updated progress
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t really sync with the software which is particular annoying when it comes to tagging questions. It also fails to accurately show my progress.
reviews.author: Scott Rosenbaum

reviews.title: Decent, computer module has more
reviews.comment: Wish it included TBS, and true false section
reviews.author: kitsune cloud

reviews.title: Unable to choose the answer
reviews.comment: The program is great. However, it seems the app doesn\'t allow you to choose an answer. I that gets fixed the app is pretty handy.
reviews.author: Javier Fonseca

reviews.title: Quiz buttons don\'t work
reviews.comment: This app would be great if the multiple choice options could be selected.
reviews.author: Patrick Dyer

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Wish you could access the full review, the supplements are nice to have on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Metrics not update
reviews.comment: I have both Samsung galaxy tablet and S3. Metrics from questions completed on the phone don\'t syn on the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Metrics don\'t update
reviews.comment: On galaxy s3 metrics from questions completed on the phone foil to update on the website
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YOU NEED TO FIX THIS
reviews.comment: Hi,  Paying CPA Excel Student here. Please fix the glitch that occurs when I answer a question correctly in recording mode and it doesnt register as a completed question. I really want the metrics to be accurate- its essential for this app.   I honestly cant believe you are charging so much money for an app with so many glitches. Overall, the most recent update was a big step forward, so please continue the progress and spend more time and effort fixing ALL the annoying glitches and complaints from this User Review area.   I\'ll tell you what- fix the glitches in the next 48 hours and I will make it a point to recommend this course to 10 of my accounting friends. That\'s thousands of dollars in your pocket, just for being moderately responsive to your customers wishes.  Waiting...  -Bryan
reviews.author: A Google User
